name: Ruins of Fishtopio
description:
You command four robo-cats which serve as scouting units for your expedition into the Ruins of Fishtopio! Find treasure, and maybe even a way out, if not you can always just teleport your cats back to the ship.

Made for CT.JS Jam with a bunch of stock images.

Tried to adhere to all of the challenges, which were  "The game takes place underwater", "The game is a dungeon crawler",  "You cannot control the character(s) directly",  "The game is about cats in space", and "There are no living beings in the game." No sound in this one though, sadly.
